channel.title: Float Geeks
channel.itunes:subtitle: Float Geeks a podcast about everyting related to the float industry.
channel.itunes:author: The Float Geeks
channel.itunes:summary: The Float Geeks podcast dives deep into the float tank industry. We talk about how to setup a float tank, customizing the filtration system, what happens in the tank, research about the health benefits of the tank, and much more.
channel.description: The Float Geeks podcast dives deep into the float tank industry. We talk about how to setup a float tank, customizing the filtration system, what happens in the tank, research about the health benefits of the tank, and much more.

item.title: Lets talk about the Zen Float Tent
item.itunes:subtitle: Chatting about Zen Float Tent
item.itunes:author: Float Geeks
item.itunes:summary: We talk about the Zen Float Tent, the float conference, and how floating at home is becoming a big deal.
